General.Name: Gemac Engineering Machinery Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Gemac Engineering Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, sale, and maintenance of rail engineering equipment in China. It provides tamping, stable, ballast, material transportation, rail treatment, comprehensive inspection, and bridge inspection products. The company also provides mechanical and hydraulic transmission rail cars, electric drive railcars, lifting rail cars, and flat cars, as well as catenary pay-off cars, catenary inspection vehicles, catenary pole work vehicles, catenary flat cars, and insulator water washing cars. In addition, it offers track engineering equipment maintenance services; and overhaul services. The company was founded in 1958 and is based in Xiangyang, China.
